title: Open Your Legs for my Two Brothers
description: I'm being blackmailed by my boyfriend's best friend for sex. That's right. He's obsessed with me. He wants to f*** me creatively in all my orifices. He can't get enough of me.  Now he wants me to f*** his two older brothers. They are handsome and rugged rough beasts of men who work with their hands. They want to give me a proper welcome with the tools of their trade.  Do I do it? Or do I call their bluff?  STORIES IN THIS SERIES Open Your Legs for my Camera Open Your Legs for my Two Brothers Open Your Legs for the Discipline Master Open Your Legs for the Partygoers Open Your Legs for the Empire Builders Open Your Legs for the Forbidden Lover Open Your Legs for the Rough Riders Open Your Legs for the Military Boys Part 1
author: Aphrodite Hunt
